affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "GENERIC" );
	remove ( "t492" );
	remove ( "t494" );
	use ( "smoke" );
	wait ( 2000.000 );
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/pain_death/male/choke.mp3" );
	wait ( 3000.000 );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_HEALTH", "-1" );
}
